channel.title: 'Replies in a row' limit. Disable for higher level members?
channel.description:
Hi.
Forum settings currently limit how many posts a member can make in a row, within a thread, to three.
Is it possible to disable that limit for members above a certain trust level? (Or can someone post something, so it resets my posts-in-a-row limit? ;)
I ask bc I'm prevented from adding more posts to this thread…
https://disco.auxy.co/t/post-branding-distribution-and-marketing-tips-links-embeds-only/9781/59
Ofc, I could start a new thread, but it's handy to have that kind of info contained in a single thread. Alternatively, I could simply stop sharing stuff like this. (Tbh, it's unclear if anyone's getting any value from that info — though it's aimed at encouraging members to push their music a bit further by showing the what/how.)

item.description:
Hi.

Forum settings currently limit how many posts a member can make in a row, within a thread, to three.

Is it possible to disable that limit for members above a certain trust level?
(Or can someone post something, so it resets my posts-in-a-row limit?

I ask bc I’m prevented from adding more posts to this thread…

Ofc, I could start a new thread, but it’s handy to have that kind of info contained in a single thread.
Alternatively, I could simply stop sharing stuff like this. (Tbh, it’s unclear if anyone’s getting any value from that info — though it’s aimed at encouraging members to push their music a bit further by showing the what/how.)
